00021 #if BOOST_VERSION >= 104700
00022   // Global random object.
00023   extern boost::random::mt19937 randGen;
00024   // Global uniform distribution.
00025   extern boost::random::uniform_01<> randUniformDist;
00026 #else
00027   // Global random object.
00028   extern boost::mt19937 randGen;
00029   // Global uniform distribution.
00030   extern boost::uniform_01<> randUniformDist;
00031 #endif
00032 
00036 inline double Random()
00037 {
00038   return randUniformDist(randGen);
00039 }

00044 inline double Random(double lo, double hi)
00045 {
00046   #if BOOST_VERSION >= 104700
00047     boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(lo, hi);
00048   #else
00049     boost::uniform_real<> dist(lo, hi);
00050   #endif
00051 
00052   return dist(randGen);
00053 }
00054 
00058 inline int RandInt(int hiExclusive)
00059 {
00060   #if BOOST_VERSION >= 104700
00061     boost::random::uniform_int_distribution<> dist(0, hiExclusive - 1);
00062   #else
00063     boost::uniform_int<> dist(0, hiExclusive - 1);
00064   #endif
00065 
00066   return dist(randGen);
00067 }
00068 
00072 inline int RandInt(int lo, int hiExclusive)
00073 {
00074   #if BOOST_VERSION >= 104700
00075     boost::random::uniform_int_distribution<> dist(lo, hiExclusive - 1);
00076   #else
00077     boost::uniform_int<> dist(0, hiExclusive - 1);
00078   #endif
00079
